function.name: closed_dbm

unit.cpp:define: #define GetDBM(obj, dbmp) do {TypedData_Get_Struct((obj), struct dbmdata, &dbm_type, (dbmp));if ((dbmp)->di_dbm == 0) closed_dbm();} while (0)
